function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global impact of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Unprecedented impact on public health and human behavior","Mitigation":"Strict implementation of containment measures","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Changed relation between humans and public spaces","Impact":"Altered use and perception of urban green spaces (UGS)","Mitigation":"Urban planning for post-pandemic public spaces","Technologies":"Sensor-based crowd monitoring, smart city technologies","People":"Urban residents, city planners","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, city administrators"},{"Description":"Diversity of societies and cultures in study countries","Impact":"Influence on use and perception of UGS during the COVID-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Cultural sensitivity in urban planning and design","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, digital ethnography tools","People":"Local communities, urban residents","Owner":"Urban planners, researchers"}]}
